column4: Hey, I have added a new logical volume, how do I get the UUID for it? It does not appear in blkid, although the other logical volume in the volume group does.
I do vol_id --uuid /dev/mapper/vg01-backup and I get "unknown or non-unique volume type", am I doing something wrong?

I tried vol_id but it says "unknown or non-unique volume type", I actually got the UUID from lvdisplay, but having it doesn't do much because the volume isnt in /dev/disk/by-uuid/ so it is unrecognized anyway.
